definition: suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
how (wonderful etc)/what (a great idea etc)/however (difficult it may be etc)/(in interrogative sentences) how (much etc)/to what extent
what are you doing?/what's he up to?

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那靈感是來自保險絲盒與監獄的雜交麼。

sentences.english: Not very much. You are a turnkey at the Conciergerie?
sentences.chinese: 要你乾的並不太多。你在附屬監獄管牢房麼？
倫敦的臺爾森銀行麼，先生？

sentences.english: What did they do? Please give at least two examples.
sentences.chinese: 他們做了什麼？請至少舉出兩個例子。
她還跟那個異教徒一起麼？

sentences.english: Do we require of our writers to fight the system?
sentences.chinese: 我們要求我們的作家去和體制抗爭麼？

sentences.english: I'd do it agian. you know?
sentences.chinese: 我願意再來一次，你知道麼？

sentences.english: Could you tell me what the maximun weight allowances?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我最高津貼是多少麼？

sentences.english: Do you understand what I said?
Then am I to go back empty-handed?

sentences.chinese: 那麼，我就要開始老了麼？

sentences.english: Smoke son, here, do you have a familiar felling?
sentences.chinese: 煙兒，這裏，你有何熟悉的感覺麼？

sentences.english: I also. The seed of Abraham are they?
sentences.chinese: 我也是。他們是亞伯拉罕的後裔麼？

sentences.english: I doubt that you have two brain cells to rub together-does that count?
sentences.chinese: 我懷疑你沒有兩個能融到一起的腦細胞，這算數麼？

sentences.english: Bajiu Shi - year - old man , nature as a child , to care too much?
sentences.chinese: 八九十歲的老人，性情就像孩子，能太計較麼？

definition: don't tell me .../could it be that...?
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
